018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.log;
019
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.logging.Level;
022import java.util.logging.Logger;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024
025import org.json.JSONArray;
026import org.json.JSONObject;
027
028import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
029import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
030import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
031
032/**
033 * Actor reference for DistributedLogStore.
034 *
035 * <p>This class wraps a {@link DistributedLogStore} as an actor, allowing
036 * other actors (like WorkflowReporter) to query logs via message passing.</p>
037 *
038 * <h2>Supported Actions</h2>
039 * <ul>
040 *   <li>{@code getLogsByLevel} - Get logs filtered by level. Args: [sessionId, level]</li>
041 *   <li>{@code getSummary} - Get session summary. Args: [sessionId]</li>
042 *   <li>{@code getLatestSessionId} - Get the most recent session ID</li>
043 *   <li>{@code listSessions} - List recent sessions. Args: [limit]</li>
044 * </ul>
045 *
046 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
047 * @since 2.12.2
048 */
049public class H2LogReaderIIAR extends IIActorRef<DistributedLogStore> {
050
051    private final Logger logger;
052
053    /**
054     * Constructs a new H2LogReaderIIAR.
055     *
056     * @param actorName the name of this actor (e.g., "logStore")
057     * @param logStore the DistributedLogStore instance
058     * @param system the actor system
059     */
060    public H2LogReaderIIAR(String actorName, DistributedLogStore logStore, IIActorSystem system) {
061        super(actorName, logStore, system);
062        this.logger = Logger.getLogger(actorName);
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
067        logger.fine(String.format("H2LogReaderIIAR: actionName=%s, arg=%s", actionName, arg));
068
069        try {
070            return switch (actionName) {
071                case "getLogsByLevel" -> handleGetLogsByLevel(arg);
072                case "getSummary" -> handleGetSummary(arg);
073                case "getLatestSessionId" -> handleGetLatestSessionId();
074                case "listSessions" -> handleListSessions(arg);
075                default -> new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
076            };
077        } catch (Exception e) {
078            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error in " + actionName, e);
079            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
080        }
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * Handles getLogsByLevel action.
085     *
086     * <p>Args format: [sessionId, level] or {"sessionId": N, "level": "INFO"}</p>
087     *
088     * @param arg JSON array or object with sessionId and level
089     * @return ActionResult with JSON array of log entries
090     */
091    private ActionResult handleGetLogsByLevel(String arg) {
092        long sessionId;
093        LogLevel level;
094
095        if (arg.startsWith("[")) {
096            JSONArray arr = new JSONArray(arg);
097            sessionId = arr.getLong(0);
098            level = LogLevel.valueOf(arr.getString(1));
099        } else {
100            JSONObject obj = new JSONObject(arg);
101            sessionId = obj.getLong("sessionId");
102            level = LogLevel.valueOf(obj.getString("level"));
103        }
104
105        List<LogEntry> logs = this.object.getLogsByLevel(sessionId, level);
106
107        // Convert to JSON array
108        JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
109        for (LogEntry entry : logs) {
110            JSONObject logJson = new JSONObject();
111            logJson.put("id", entry.getId());
112            logJson.put("sessionId", entry.getSessionId());
113            String timestamp = entry.getTimestamp() != null ? entry.getTimestamp().toString() : null;
114            if (timestamp != null) {
115                logJson.put("timestamp", timestamp);
116            }
117            logJson.put("actorName", entry.getActorName());
118            logJson.put("label", entry.getLabel());
119            logJson.put("actionName", entry.getActionName());
120            logJson.put("level", entry.getLevel().name());
121            logJson.put("message", entry.getMessage());
122            logJson.put("exitCode", entry.getExitCode());
123            logJson.put("durationMs", entry.getDurationMs());
124            result.put(logJson);
125        }
126
127        return new ActionResult(true, result.toString());
128    }
129
130    /**
131     * Handles getSummary action.
132     *
133     * <p>Args format: [sessionId] or sessionId as string</p>
134     *
135     * @param arg session ID
136     * @return ActionResult with JSON session summary
137     */
138    private ActionResult handleGetSummary(String arg) {
139        long sessionId;
140        if (arg.startsWith("[")) {
141            JSONArray arr = new JSONArray(arg);
142            sessionId = arr.getLong(0);
143        } else {
144            sessionId = Long.parseLong(arg.trim());
145        }
146
147        SessionSummary summary = this.object.getSummary(sessionId);
148        if (summary == null) {
149            return new ActionResult(false, "Session not found: " + sessionId);
150        }
151
152        JSONObject result = new JSONObject();
153        result.put("sessionId", summary.getSessionId());
154        result.put("workflowName", summary.getWorkflowName());
155        result.put("overlayName", summary.getOverlayName());
156        result.put("inventoryName", summary.getInventoryName());
157        String startedAt = summary.getStartedAt() != null ? summary.getStartedAt().toString() : null;
158        if (startedAt != null) {
159            result.put("startedAt", startedAt);
160        }
161        String endedAt = summary.getEndedAt() != null ? summary.getEndedAt().toString() : null;
162        if (endedAt != null) {
163            result.put("endedAt", endedAt);
164        }
165        result.put("nodeCount", summary.getNodeCount());
166        result.put("status", summary.getStatus().name());
167        result.put("successCount", summary.getSuccessCount());
168        result.put("failedCount", summary.getFailedCount());
169        result.put("failedNodes", summary.getFailedNodes());
170        result.put("totalLogEntries", summary.getTotalLogEntries());
171        result.put("errorCount", summary.getErrorCount());
172
173        return new ActionResult(true, result.toString());
174    }
175
176    /**
177     * Handles getLatestSessionId action.
178     *
179     * @return ActionResult with latest session ID
180     */
181    private ActionResult handleGetLatestSessionId() {
182        long sessionId = this.object.getLatestSessionId();
183        if (sessionId < 0) {
184            return new ActionResult(false, "No sessions found");
185        }
186        return new ActionResult(true, String.valueOf(sessionId));
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Handles listSessions action.
191     *
192     * <p>Args format: [limit] or limit as string</p>
193     *
194     * @param arg limit
195     * @return ActionResult with JSON array of session summaries
196     */
197    private ActionResult handleListSessions(String arg) {
198        int limit = 10; // default
199        if (arg != null && !arg.isEmpty() && !arg.equals("[]")) {
200            if (arg.startsWith("[")) {
201                JSONArray arr = new JSONArray(arg);
202                if (arr.length() > 0) {
203                    limit = arr.getInt(0);
204                }
205            } else {
206                limit = Integer.parseInt(arg.trim());
207            }
208        }
209
210        List<SessionSummary> sessions = this.object.listSessions(limit);
211
212        JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
213        for (SessionSummary summary : sessions) {
214            JSONObject obj = new JSONObject();
215            obj.put("sessionId", summary.getSessionId());
216            obj.put("workflowName", summary.getWorkflowName());
217            obj.put("status", summary.getStatus().name());
218            String startedAt = summary.getStartedAt() != null ? summary.getStartedAt().toString() : null;
219            if (startedAt != null) {
220                obj.put("startedAt", startedAt);
221            }
222            result.put(obj);
223        }
224
225        return new ActionResult(true, result.toString());
226    }
227}
